words.imagePrompt: A team of players racing against a giant clock
words.clue: A TEAM (sounds like 'ti') racing against time, saying 'PO!' as they run. TIEMPO = TEAM + PO

words.imagePrompt: A sir (knight) looking in a mirror saying 'This is who I BE'
words.clue: A SIR (sounds like 'SER') looking in the mirror to BE himself. SER sounds just like SIR

words.imagePrompt: A grand piano eating smaller instruments
words.clue: A GRAND (GRANDE) piano is so BIG it's eating other instruments. GRANDE = GRAND + E

words.imagePrompt: A purse owner showing ID to enter a club
words.clue: A PURSE OWNER (sounds like 'persona') showing ID to prove they're a PERSON. PERSONA = PURSE + OWNER

words.imagePrompt: A yellow star with arms and legs trying on different costumes
words.clue: This STAR (sounds like 'STAR') keeps changing what it wants to BE. ESTAR = E + STAR

words.imagePrompt: A newborn lined up to vote for the first time
words.clue: A NEW-born baby is NEW to VO-ting. NUEVO = NEWBORN + VOTING

words.imagePrompt: A crying child saying 'I know, I know' while looking at a calendar
words.clue: The kid cries 'AÑO!' (sounds like 'I know!') while looking at how many YEARS have passed. AÑO sounds just like I KNOW

words.imagePrompt: A teenager nervously holding too many phones and gadgets
words.clue: This TEEN (TEN-er) HAS way too many things. TENER = TEEN + ER

words.imagePrompt: A buoy in the ocean rescuing swimmers
words.clue: A BUOY (BUE-no) saving people is doing something GOOD. BUENO = BUOY + NO

words.imagePrompt: A deer jumping over a rising sun
words.clue: A DEER ('día' sounds like 'deer') jumps over the rising sun to start a new DAY. DÍA sounds just like DEER

words.imagePrompt: A hatchet chopping ice into a sculpture
words.clue: A HATCHET (HA-cer) MAKES things by chopping ice. HACER = HATCHET without the 't'

words.imagePrompt: An alto saxophone growing up through the clouds
words.clue: An ALTO saxophone grows so TALL it reaches the clouds. It's exactly like the musical term!

words.imagePrompt: A confused person opening a box saying 'What's so special?'
words.clue: Looking at this THING in the box saying 'What's SO special?' COSA = CO + SA (sounds like 'so')

words.imagePrompt: A powder puff turning into a superhero cape
words.clue: With POWDER (PODER) turning into a cape, they CAN do anything. PODER = POWDER without the 'w'

words.imagePrompt: A peek-a-boo ninja hiding in a tiny box
words.clue: A PEEK-A-BOO (PE-que-ÑO) ninja is so SMALL they can hide anywhere. PEQUEÑO sounds like PEEK + ÑO

words.imagePrompt: A video game character with multiple hearts collecting extra lives
words.clue: A VIDEO game (VI-da) character collecting extra LIVES. VIDA = VIDEO + DA

words.imagePrompt: A dice with a speech bubble SAYING the number rolled
words.clue: The DICE (DE-cir) SAYS what number it rolled. DECIR = DICE + IR

words.imagePrompt: A viagra pill with a senior citizen card
words.clue: The VI (from viagra) makes this OLD guy say 'EH-HO!' VIEJO = VI + EH + JO

words.imagePrompt: Monday written on a globe-shaped calendar
words.clue: It's MON-day (MUN sounds like 'Mon') in the whole WORLD. MUNDO = MONDAY without the 'ay'

words.imagePrompt: An ear with legs running in a race
words.clue: An EAR (sounds like 'IR') with legs GOES running. IR is like 'ear' without the 'e'

words.imagePrompt: A female lizard wearing a party hat and grinning
words.clue: This FEMALE LIZARD (FE-LIZ) is super HAPPY. FELIZ = FEMALE + LIZ(ard)

words.imagePrompt: A farmer shaping crops into geometric patterns
words.clue: A FARMER (FOR-ma) giving FORM to the crops. FORMA = FARMER without the 'er'

words.imagePrompt: A bear wearing glasses to SEE better
words.clue: A BEAR (sounds like 'VER') needs glasses to SEE. VER sounds like BEAR without the 'b'

words.imagePrompt: A row of judges wearing embarrassed, blushing faces
words.clue: A ROW (RO-jo) of judges blush RED with embarrassment. ROJO = ROW + JO

words.imagePrompt: A castle made of playing cards
words.clue: A CASTLE (CA-sa) made of cards is still a HOUSE. CASA = CASTLE without 'tle'

words.imagePrompt: A dark cloud raining presents
words.clue: A DARK (DAR) cloud GIVES presents as rain. DAR = DARK without the 'k'

words.imagePrompt: A large go-kart stretching like rubber
words.clue: A LARGE (LAR-go) go-kart stretches until it's super LONG. LARGO = LARGE without the 'e'

words.imagePrompt: A party where everyone has one piece of a puzzle
words.clue: At this PARTY (PARTE), everyone has their PART of the puzzle. PARTE = PARTY without the 'y'

words.imagePrompt: A saber-toothed tiger reading a library of books
words.clue: A SABER-toothed tiger KNOWS everything from reading. SABER is exactly like the sword!

words.imagePrompt: A face getting slapped with a fish, looking surprisingly calm
words.clue: Getting slapped with a FISH is EASY for this FACE (FÁ-cil). FÁCIL = FACE getting hit by fish
